Description: Tony Perotti Classic Zip-Around Womens Leather Laptop Bag in Black Tony Perotti Italy Fine Italian Craftsmanship - Luxurious Fashion Design - High Quality Function Since 1970 Tony Perotti has been constantly introducing styles that set future trends while maintaining a firm footing in the noblest Italian traditions of leather craft. All of our Tony Perotti products are made from carefully selected genuine Italian full grain hides, tanned in the most recognized expertise and leather craftsmanship based on ancient and noble Italian artisanship. The cool Italian weather prevents any flea or tick irritation to the animals, attributing to the top quality and purity of the leather without any scratches or bites. The tanning process utilizes an eco-friendly approach by using vegetable extracts without the use of toxic or polluting substances. This vegetable tanning process allows the leather to retain its natural look and feel, as well as beautifying and maturing over time to develop a pleasant patina that gives the wallet an antique look as it gets older. It also allows the leather to be easily manageable and maintained, as the vegetable oils and dye can cover any scratches or marks on the leather by rubbing it off with a fine cloth or leather cleaning lotion. We are certain that you will love and appreciate our products. Thank you for being part of this tradition! SPECIFICATIONS: -100% Genuine Italian Leather -Interior Fabric Lining -Double stitched seams -Stainless Steel Hardware PRODUCT FEATURES: -Top Zip Around -Accommodates Laptops up to 17" screen size -Zipper can be locked with small key lock (included) -Interior zippered pocket, auxiliary pockets for phone and calculator, pen holder, credit and business card slots -Top Double Handles can fit over shoulder -Comes with adjustable and detachable shoulder strap - Dimensions: 17�(L) x 12�(H) x 5�(W) Weight: 3lbs 100% GENUINE LEATHER MADE IN ITALY: Made from Full Grain Italian Bull Hide Leather. Eco-friendly vegetable tanned for greater durability, texture and feel. Leather is smooth to the touch with a shiny glossed finish. The vegetable oils and tanning process allows the leather to enhance over time and grow a very distinct patina as it matures while maintaining its natural look and feel as well as its strength and durability. HIGH QUALITY: Handmade. Superior double stitching detail holds the gussets and various pockets firmly together. Stainless steel hardware parts and zipper pulls. Beautiful interior satin fabric lining. FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Fits Laptops up to 17" screen size. Zipper pull can be locked (included) at the end with a mini padlock. Double top handles can fit over your shoulder. Base is sturdy and bag stays standing up even without contents inside. ORGANIZATION & FEATURES: Three(3) business and credit card holders, two(2) pen holders, two(2) stationary organizational pouches, and two(2) large organizational pouches. Interior mesh pocket, large narrow zippered compartment for documents. Padded laptop compartment with top velcro safe strap. Comes in signature Tony Perotti gift box. Dimensions: 17�(L) x 12�(H) x 5�(W). Weight: 3lbs. SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: This product is backed by a 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee and comes with a Limited Lifetime Warranty which covers hardware parts, malfunction defects and replacement for the life of the product. It does not cover normal wear and tear issues, stains, holes, or mistreatment. DISCLAIMER: The leather on our products is handmade and dyed, and the surface characteristics and color of the product may vary from the pictures shown. Return Policy We accept returns and exchanges within 30 days of your order date. Please contact us in order to receive an RMA and a return address. Please allow up to 7 days from the day that we receive the return for the refund to be reflected on your account. For exchanges- please contact us with the item you would like to exchange it to in order for us to confirm its availability. Shipping Free Shipping - We offer free economy shipping on all of our products. If you choose free shipping, the item will ship via the most economical shipping method available, whether it's UPS or USPS. International Shipments Most international shipments are shipped via USPS (UPS is available to Canada as well). Please allow plenty of time for the item to arrive as shipping times vary due to customs and many other factors. Please also note that the import duties, taxes and other charges are not included in the item price and are the buyer's responsibility. Store Policy Positive Feedback and Service - our number one goal is to exceed your expectations. We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and try to treat our customer the way we want to be treated. If you experience any problems with your order or product, please contact us via email or phone. We will do everything we can in order to improve your experience with us. Sales Tax - we collect sales tax for the residents of GA- 7% Payment - Please pay with PayPal. This is the most secure and reliable method of payment Item Condition - All items are brand new with original tags, unless specifically stated otherwise Contact Us - please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. You can reach us by phone or through the ebay messaging system. We we will do our best to accommodate any special orders and requests. Embossing Personalize you item for free! We offer free embossing on most of our products. All you need to do is send us the initials you want after the completion of your order. The font for all briefcases, luggage and handbags is Times New Roman size 28". The font for all wallets and smaller items is Times New Roman 14". We can also emboss company logos and other symbols for a fee- please contact us for details. Please note: embossing may take up to three additional business days. Embossed items cannot be return for any reason.
